infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Raw Dawg uses the camera with on-device face detection to verify you stay present and track stillness during focus sessions. No face data is stored or shared.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Raw Dawg needs microphone access to record verification videos during focus sessions.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Raw Dawg needs photo library access to save your session videos and share cards.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Raw Dawg needs permission to save your session verification videos and selfie share cards to your photo library.
